name: Lothar Baumgarten
biography:
Born in Rheinsberg, Germany in 1944.
Now lives in Dusseldorf and New York.
Recipient: Lichtwark-Preis der Freie und hanse-Stadt Hamburg, Germany 1997; The Golden Lion, First Prize of 41st Venice Biennale, Venice 1984; Prize of the County of Nordrhein Westfalen, Germany 1976; Prize of the City of Düsseldorf, Germany
